sentences.english: Last weekend, we called on our grandparents.
sentences.chinese: 上週末，我們拜望了祖父母。

sentences.english: There are six people in my family counting my grandfather and grandmother.
sentences.chinese: 我家裏連祖父母算在內有六口人。

sentences.english: I had no grandparent to stand proudly for me.
sentences.chinese: 沒有祖父母會爲我自豪地站起來。

sentences.english: He went on to explain that his grandparents needed help on the weekends.
sentences.chinese: 接着他解釋道，他的祖父母週末需要人幫助。

sentences.english: , in the 1970s, my paternal grandparents lived in the house immediately behind us.
sentences.chinese: 當時，我父親的祖父母就住在我家後面。

sentences.english: Our family celebrated my grandparents' golden wedding anniversary in a big way last Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 上個星期日，我家隆重慶祝了我祖父母的金婚紀念日。

sentences.english: I had gone back to my hometown and spent some time with my grandparents.
sentences.chinese: 我回到我的家鄉和我的祖父母呆了一段時間。

sentences.english: My grandparents feed their pigs with leftovers .
sentences.chinese: 我的祖父母用廚餘餵豬。

sentences.english: Your grandparents go swimming every day?
sentences.chinese: 你祖父母每天去游泳嗎？

sentences.english: I shared happy times with my grandparents while visiting them on my vacation.
sentences.chinese: 當我在假期拜訪祖父母時，和他們共渡了快樂的時光。

sentences.english: My grandparents immigrated to the USA from China.
sentences.chinese: 我的祖父母從中國移居到美國。

sentences.english: Many grandparents buy a set of dolls for their first granddaughter.
sentences.chinese: 許多祖父母爲他們的第一個孫女購買鄭濤的玩偶。

sentences.english: His father knew it, but his grandma doted on him.
sentences.chinese: 他的父親知道這一點，可他的祖父母仍然寵着他。

sentences.english: I went to meet his grandparents and accepted the job.
sentences.chinese: 我去與他的祖父母見面並接下了工作。

sentences.english: She went to visit her grandparents every few weeks.
sentences.chinese: 她每隔幾周去看望她的祖父母。

sentences.english: Yes, my grandparents live there too.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我的祖父母也住在那裏。

definition: to support/to provide support for/to maintain
